extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite   ECON310 and ECON322
Corequisite    ECON351

basic.description: Selected topics in financial economics. Topics may include: the microeconomics of banking; pricing of financial instruments; risk management and financial markets infrastructure; financial choices under uncertainty and general equilibrium. Students are directed to the undergraduate website for a detailed description yearly.
basic.subject: ECON
basic.title: Topics in Financial Economics
